New Records: India won by 68 runs, the largest margin of victory in ICC Men's T20 World Cup semi-finals
Key Match Events: Axar Patel took 3 wickets for 23 runs
Kuldeep Yadav took 3 wickets for 19 runs
Pre-Game Insights: Experts predicted India as the favorites given their home advantage
India's spinners were expected to play a key role in the match
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma praised the team's intent and risk-taking approach
Axar Patel was hailed as the game-changer with his three-wicket haul
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played on a tough pitch in Providence, Guyana
Rohit Sharma's strike rate in the powerplay was 133
England's spinners struggled to cope with India's batters moving around in the crease
